properties.entry: INSERT INTO TODOLIST VALUES (?, ? ,(SELECT MEMBER_NO FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO= ? ),'N')
SELECT * FROM TODOLIST WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? ORDER BY TODO_NO ASC
DELETE TODOLIST WHERE MEMBER_NO=? AND FLAG='Y'
UPDATE TODOLIST SET FLAG='Y' WHERE MEMBER_NO=?
UPDATE TODOLIST SET FLAG='N' WHERE MEMBER_NO=?
UPDATE TODOLIST SET FLAG='Y' WHERE TODO_NO =?
UPDATE TODOLIST SET FLAG='N' WHERE TODO_NO=?
UPDATE TODOLIST SET TODO_CONTENTS=? WHERE TODO_NO=?
